Sentence.sentence: What was the pride of President Barry Mills of Bowdoin College?
Barry Mills, the president of Bowdoin College, was justifiably proud of Bowdoin's efforts to recruit minority students.
That's particularly true when it comes to the work place', says Barry Schwartz, an author of six books about human behavior.
